Articles.Content:
I don't know if the title is apropiate, but... Here it comes!

part that will be the inverted of a Mk 1-2 pod (2.5 meters wide).

It would be like putting the reverse one of those cabins.

Thus, created as a bowl in which if a docking port 1.25 meters inside it were placed, shape or create illusion that a ship ports comprised 1.25 at the end of cabins Mark 1-2 away completely so (2.5 meters wide). thus would be more stable and ... More Kerbal!

I don't know if the translator worked fine, so... a very bad draw will explain it better!

It's a little hard to tell from your drawing (also, you may want to use a clean sheet of paper next time - your other stuff is just barely visible), but I think something like this is what you're trying to illustrate:

(A crappy model thrown together in about 20 seconds in blender)

Good idea though
